children.value: Configure payload logging for a Managed Ruleset in the dashboard
Configure payload logging for a ruleset in the ruleset configuration page.
next to the Managed Ruleset you want to configure.
At the bottom of the page, click
After reading and understanding the implications of enabling payload logging, select one of the available options:
Generate key pair using your web browser
— Generates a key pair (a private and a public key) in your browser and configures payload logging with the generated public key.
If you generated a key pair in the browser, copy the displayed private key and
. You will use this private key later to
